biotools.summary: Software that is used to detect genomic islands in prokaryotic genomes. It collects prokaryotic genome data from public websites based on users’ specification, analyzes genome features using multiple sources, including embedded third-party software Alien_hunter and REPuter, and predict genomic islands based on our trained models, which are decision-tree based ensemble classifiers.

bioschemas.name: GIDetector
